name: Colourseum
description:
Requires 4 Xbox controllers.

  • Left Thumbstick - Move your character
  • Right Thumbstick - Aim your character
  • Right Trigger - Fire basic projectile
  • Left trigger - Use unique ability defined by character

The object of the game is to be the last player on the platform, there is no health only pushing other players around. Each character has their own unique ability in addition to a general basic projectile, remember to use the objects that randomly spawn in the level to your advantage as well.
